subject: Looking for medications?
body:
Dear customer.
CanadianPharmacy is one of very few online stores that sell generic medications only. Don't waste too much on what can cost less.
At CanadianPharmacy you will always be able to find the generic drugs you need and they will be a lot cheaper that those sold in the USA CanadianPharmacy is a licensed Canadian e-shop, which lets it (and you too) turn the Canadian drug taxation system to its advantage.
Don't put your health and the health of your relatives in danger choose CanadianPharmacy.
Sincerely yours,Shelby Medeiros
